text: John Rune "Jompa" Eriksson (12 March 1929 – 24 March 2020) was a Swedish footballer and manager. He played as a forward. Eriksson was born in Stockholm. He played club football for Värtans IK, Djurgårdens IF and Vällingby AIK. With Djurgården, he won the Allsvenskan in 1954–55 and 1959. He also made ten appearances for the Swedish national team. Eriksson died on 24 March 2020 at the age of 91. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Djurgårdens IF *Allsvenskan: 1954–55, 1959 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swedish football managers Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers from Stockholm
title: John Eriksson (footballer)
